metadata.title: Manoel Gustavo - Full Stack Developer

home.description: As a Computer Science graduate and full stack developer, I have experience across the entire software development cycle. I am proactive, responsible, agile and communicative. My main focus is to deliver and add value to the product, regardless of technological preferences.
